file_content.text: Um, hello?
Warm welcome.
What're you lookin' at?
What?
Friendly.
At ease, they're here at our lord's request.
At ease, he's here at our lord's request.
At ease, she's here at our lord's request.
Let's get on with this, bounty hunter. I've troops to deploy.
Darth Tormen demands that I dispatch you to capture Chairman Harlon Fane of the Corellian Corporate Council.
Where can I find Chairman Fane?
Just point the way.
They some kind of governing body?
What is the Corporate Council?
The council is the political face of the business sector, representing every major corporation operating in the Corellian system.
What's Tormen's interest in a corporate fat cat?
I thought I was after rebels.
Harlon Fane is the face of the Corporate Council. His presence at the treaty signing is vital to Darth Tormen's plans.
Fane and the other representatives have locked themselves up in their council tower in defiance of Imperial rule.
His exact location isn't known, but it is likely that he and the other senior representatives are holed up in the tower's upper executive offices.
Get me a shuttle and I'll take things from the top.
Drop me on the roof.
The anti-aircraft coverage over Incorporation Island would atomize you immediately. Ground assault is the only option.
I imagine there's more than a few locked doors involved.
Where's the challenge?
Weapon emplacements, prototype droids and a private security force of ex-military contractors armed with the best equipment money can't buy.
These other reps worth anything to you?
Targets of opportunity?
If you are able to capture other members of the Corporate Council, do so, but Chairman Fane is the absolute priority.
Resistance will be heavy, but the council tower has several structural weaknesses we can exploit.
The only thing stopping you from accessing the tower through the main lobby is sheer manpower.
I hope you're not suggesting I take the stairs.
That's a long hike to the top.
For now, you have another option.
I'll expect a warm welcome.
The more, the merrier.
You'll have their undivided attention. I hope you're prepared for it.
So what you mean is nothing's preventing me from accessing the tower.
Guards aren't an obstacle.
If battling heavily entrenched soldiers one flight of stairs at a time is no trouble, be my guest.
The executive suites have a private lift that will bypass most of the intervening levels. It'll require an access key used by senior staff.
Also, unless you'd like to be trapped inside a lift shaft, you'll need to attack the tower's security center and disable their lift override controls.
If there's nothing else, General, I'd like to get started.
That everything?
Solid plan, General. I've got it from here.
Thanks for the advice.
Once those objectives have been completed, you should have a straight shot to the upper levels.
Doesn't sound complicated.
Hope so, no one will be coming to your rescue.
And remember, you're to deliver Chairman Fane alive and intact. Dismissed.
